Text: Due to one-off deferred tax assets (DTA) impairment of €2 billion ($2.2 billion) in the past quarter, Deutsche Bank's reported bottom-line in Q2 2019 was negative in more than €3.1 billion ($3.4 billion).
Cause: Due to one-off deferred tax assets (DTA) impairment of €2 billion ($2.2 billion) in the past quarter
Effect: Deutsche Bank's reported bottom-line in Q2 2019 was negative in more than €3.1 billion ($3.4 billion).
Sentence: <e1>Due to one-off deferred tax assets (DTA) impairment of €2 billion ($2.2 billion) in the past quarter</e1>, <e2>Deutsche Bank's reported bottom-line in Q2 2019 was negative in more than €3.1 billion ($3.4 billion).</e2>
